Variable Label: Date of First Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes:
Date of first exposure to treatment for a subject in a study. TRTSDT and/or TRTSDTM are required if there is an investigational product. Note that TRTSDT is not required to have the same value as the SDTM DM variable RFXSTDTC. While both of these dates reflect the concept of first exposure, the ADaM date may be derived to support the analysis which may not necessarily
be the very first date in the SDTM EX domain.

Variable Label: Time of First Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes: Time of first exposure to treatment for a subject in a study.

Variable Label: Datetime of First Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes: Datetime of first exposure to treatment for a subject in a study. TRTSDT and/or TRTSDTM are required if there is an investigational product.

Variable Label: Date of First Exposure Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of date of first exposure to treatment. If TRTSDT (or the date part of TRTSDTM) was imputed, TRTSDTF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마ndTimeImputation FlagVariables.

Variable Label: Time of First Exposure Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of time of first exposure to treatment. If TRTSTM (or the time part of TRTSDTM) was imputed, TRTSTMF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마ndTimeImputation FlagVariables.

Variable Label: Date of Last Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes: Date of last exposure to treatment for a subject in a study. TRTEDT and/or TRTEDTM are required if there is an investigational product. Note that TRTEDT is not required to have the same value as the SDTM DM variable RFXENDTC. While both of these dates reflect the concept of last exposure, the ADaM date may be derived to support the analysis which may not necessarily be the very last date in the SDTM EX domain.

Variable Label: Time of Last Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes: Time of last exposure to treatment for a subject in a study.

Variable Label: Datetime of Last Exposure to Treatment
CDISC Notes: Datetime of last exposure to treatment for a subject in a study. TRTEDT and/or TRTEDTM are required if there is an investigational product.

Variable Label: Date of Last Exposure Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of date of last exposure to treatment. If TRTEDT (or the date part of TRTEDTM) was imputed, TRTEDTF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마ndTimeImputation FlagVariables.

Variable Label: Time of Last Exposure Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of time of last exposure to treatment. If TRTETM (or the time part of TRTEDTM) was imputed, TRTETMF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마ndTimeImputation FlagVariables.

Variable Label: Date of First Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Date of first exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxSDT and/or TRxxSDTM are only required in trial designs where multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P). Examples include crossover designs or designs where multiple periods exist for the same treatment.

Variable Label: Time of First Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Starting time of exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxSTM and/or TRxxSDTM are only required in trial designs where starting time is important to the analysis and multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P).

Variable Label: Datetime of First Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Datetime of first exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxSDTM is only required in trial designs where multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P).

Variable Label: Date 1st Exposure Period xx Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of date of first exposure to treatment in period xx. If TRxxSDT (or the date part of TRxxSDTM) was imputed, TRxxSDTF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마nd TimeImputationFlagVariables.

Variable Label: Time 1st Exposure Period xx Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of time of first exposure to treatment in period xx. If TRxxSTM (or the time part of TRxxSDTM) was imputed, TRxxSTMF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마nd TimeImputationFlagVariables.

Variable Label: Date of Last Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Date of last exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxEDT and/or TRxxEDTM are only required in trial designs where multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P).

Variable Label: Time of Last Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Ending time of exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxETM and/or TRxxEDTM are only required in trial designs where ending time is important to the analysis and multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P).

Variable Label: Datetime of Last Exposure in Period xx
CDISC Notes: Datetime of last exposure to treatment in period xx. TRxxEDTM is only required in trial designs where multiple treatment periods are defined (i.e., required when there is a TRTxxP other than TRT01P).

Variable Label: Date Last Exposure Period xx Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of date of last exposure to treatment in period xx. If TRxxEDT (or the date part of TRxxEDTM) was imputed, TRxxEDTF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마nd TimeImputationFlagVariables.

Variable Label: Time Last Exposure Period xx Imput. Flag
CDISC Notes: The level of imputation of time of last exposure to treatment in period xx. If TRxxETM (or the time part of TRxxEDTM) was imputed, TRxxETMF must be populated and is required. See Section 3.1.3, Date마nd TimeImputationFlagVariables.
